subject: Golf
Senior Players Championship (Golf)
AT&T National (Golf)
Irish Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Bill Haas pulled away from a crowd of contenders with three straight birdies, two good pars and one good hop to win the AT&T National.
snippet: Bill Haas pulled away from a crowd of contenders with three straight birdies, two good pars and one good hop to win the AT&T National.
